class.name: CharacterData
class.brief_description: Defines a character when put in "res://data/characters"

method.name: set_data_path
method.description: Only used by the editor. Will throw an error if used outside of the editor!

method.name: get_data_path
method.description: Returns the character data path in the character data directory.

method.name: get_sub_resources
method.description: Returns sub resources for the character.
